game.name: Noir Total : Deadly Party
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Stats, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Noir Total is a 2D local multiplayer PvP shooter set in darkened arenas. Sneak through total darkness using your controller’s vibrations, track down your enemies, collect bonuses and set traps to stay one step ahead of your opponents in fast-paced, competitive matches for up to 4 players.
